mapper.select: select DISTINCT * from heart h INNER JOIN alcohol a ON h.prod_num = a.num where h.mem_num = #{memberId}

select distinct abs( (select count(*) from orders where memid = #{memberID} )-(select count(*) from review where writer = #{memberID})) as possible, (select count(*) from review where writer = #{memberID}) AS complete from review

select a.num, a.name, od.qty, a.image from orders o INNER JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderid = od.orderid INNER JOIN alcohol a ON od.num = a.num where o.memid = #{memberID} AND od.num NOT IN (select REF from review where writer = #{memberID})

select a.num, a.name, od.qty, a.image from orders o INNER JOIN orderdetails od ON o.orderid = od.orderid INNER JOIN alcohol a ON od.num = a.num INNER JOIN review r ON r.ref = od.num where o.memid = #{memberID}
